name: " Frogger " XKCD style
description:
Link to XKCD comic

This weekend sucked. This took a lot of effort to make, way more than I thought it would. Making the physics for the cars was infuriating. All in all, I'm still happy I participated, and proud of my work, so I hope you enjoy!

Controls:
Arrow Keys - Move
Spacebar - Select
\ (forward slash) - Pause Game
